Dear Fiona, Annie, and Sara,

 

I hope this message finds you well.

 

I would like to kindly request if we could reschedule the tutorial originally planned for Friday, 30th May, to 1:30 PM London time / 7:30 AM Houston time. This adjustment would allow a colleague who is crucial to the session to join us, which I believe will enhance the overall discussion.

 

Please let me know if this new time works for you. Once confirmed, I will send an updated calendar invitation.

 

Thank you very much for your understanding and flexibility. I look forward to our upcoming session.

 

Best regards,

Saber Khalfallah
